basics.name: Luisa Catherine
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: An accomplished Software Engineer with fluency in multiple programming languages such as Go, Javascript, Python, PHP, and more. Effective and creative leader, who achieved Top Performer status twice and led a team of 4 Software Engineers which resulted in revenue increase within 6 months. Ranked 1st out of 17 graduates in Fullstack Immersive Program by Alterra Academy. Adept in analytical thinking and creative problem-solving.

highlights: Lead a team of 4 software engineers during the development of company software application, helped the company connect with a new biller, resulting in revenue increase within 6 months.
Contributed software engineering expertise in the development of products through the software lifecycle, from requirements definition through successful deployment.
Designed and maintained custom REST APIs built in Go, NodeJS, and PHP.
Designed and maintained web apps built in Nuxt.js and React.js.
Developed white-label mobile apps with Flutter.
Developed deployment scripts for white label apps from Github to GCP.
Awarded “Runner” (Top Performer) twice for performing great work.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
